sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yan hou kou chi bing 咽喉口齒病 , diseases of the throat, the mouth, and the teeth. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bo he 薄荷：利咽喉口齒諸病，治瘰癧瘡 疥，風瘙癮疹 , “It is helpful for all types of diseases of the throat, the mouth, and the teeth , and it cures scrofula with pervasion-illness, sores in general and jie -illness in particular, wind itching and dormant papules”.
